name: Mad World - Age of Darkness - MMORPG
name_original: Mad World - Age of Darkness - MMORPG
description:
A Desperate, Hardcore MMORPG with an Open World Setting


There is a deep sense of despair in Mad World right now. This is a story about shuddering with rage and struggling with madness, to which we invite you to experience as well. Blood and bodily fluids from gigantic demon corpses have contaminated this land. 'Shadow Children' must work together to save this hopeless world. And it is necessary to become a demon yourself if you want to defeat demons. Find a way to survive in world where hope is vanished.

Freely Change Your Class


Skills are based on your weapon of choice, which becomes your class. Discover your latent abilities through the potential system. In this crazy world, you will survive only if you triumph the inner trials and become stronger through the red stones located throughout.

Unpredictable Story


Mad World differs from other MMORPGs in that it strives to deliver its message through a compelling storyline. It is impossible to trust anyone in a world dominated by endless fear and despair. Despite despair within despair, your courage and adventurous spirit will serve as a beacon of hope in this seemingly hopeless world.

Artwork in Crazy 2D Style


The artworks of Mad World combine grotesque monsters with hand-drawn backgrounds in order to convey a sense of hopelessness and overwhelming despair. As a result of these artworks, you can well-perceive Mad World's universe and feel the immersive quality of the game.

Ruthless Boss Monsters


Ancient bosses and bosses from story acts are powerful monsters in Mad World. The ability to identify attack patterns quickly and cooperation with you comrades are required to defeat these monsters. To survive in the world of deep despair, it is crucial to recognize attack patterns in a short period of time and to work with your allies.
